column4: I need help. There was a fix for a bug in ibus in Maverick. However, my ibus still has this bug. How can I get my ibus updated? (I have tried purging it and reinstalling it, but to no avail)
If you look at the last 3 comments you will see my problem.
I'm asking because I'm sure people here need the bug number to troubleshoot you, not because I really know anything about it myself
